Chat with Your Website Data

Our AI assistant understands your website's health data and can help you:

  • Natural Language Insights

    Ask questions about your website's health in plain English and get instant answers.

  • Actionable Recommendations

    Get specific steps to improve your website's performance and SEO.

  • Data Analysis

    Let AI analyze your trends and identify opportunities for improvement.

  • Personalized Assistance

    Get help tailored to your website's specific needs and goals.

AI Health Assistant

Hello! I'm your AI Health Assistant. I can help you understand your website's performance and SEO data. What would you like to know?
What are my top SEO issues this week?
I've analyzed your latest health check. The main issues are: 1. 3 pages are missing meta descriptions 2. There's a broken internal link on your blog 3. Image optimization needed on your product pages Would you like me to help you fix these issues?
Yes, let's fix the meta descriptions first
Great choice! I've identified the following pages missing meta descriptions: 1. /products/new-features 2. /blog/seo-tips 3. /about-us I can help you generate optimized meta descriptions based on each page's content. Would you like me to do that?
